title: In 'Pills And Starships,' Teens Come Of Age On A Devastated Earth
teaser: Pills and Starships is a dystopian tale set in a world ravaged by climate change. NPR's Scott Simon talks to author Lydia Millet about her new young-adult novel set in the future.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
